title: Those who justify Grave Worship saying we make dua THROUGH the pious? What is Shirk?
transcript:
[Questioner] says can I ask you a question people 
who go to Graves of Pious people of Islam like the   sahaba and the imams can people pray through 
them as my dad says you don't ask from them   you ask through them is that right so basically 
what madiha is asking about is the justification   of grave worshipers when we talk to 
them and say what you're doing is [ __ ]   they say I am not doing [ __ ] I'm not asking 
the jilani or the Badawi or the Tijaani   or the Prophet (Peace and Blessing Upon Him) 
to protect me I'm asking the prophet or these   righteous people to ask Allah azzawaja 
so we are taking them as intermediaries   and this is exactly the Shirk that Allah azzawajal 
mentioned in the beginning of Surat as Zumar   Allah says and those who take protectors   besides him say we only worship them that 
they may bring us nearer to Allah in position   this is the claim of the mushrikeen of 
the idol worshipers that we worship them just that we can draw nearer and closer to Allah   so what is worshiping them it's not necessarily 
only limited in prayer bowing and prostrating   Tawaf is worshiping them slaughtering 
animals for them is worshiping them   calling them at times of distress [ __ ] 
save me I'm in a dilemma I'm in a Calamity o prophet of Allah protect me from what 
I fear all of this is worshiping them   though they claim that they are worshiping 
Allah through them we don't have anyone to to   be intermediate between us and Allah 
azzawajal Allah says in the Quran invoke me and I shall respond to you I shall 
answer you this is what Allah says and you say   no no no we'd rather take a different route 
this would take you straight to hell so tell   your father that what he's doing is mentioned 
in the Quran and it is totally prohibited and have you ever taken a counseling session with 
me go to my website and you will find counseling   sessions and apply for one if you can afford it 
that's good for you if you cannot you're entitled   for one free session and this is for everybody 
if they can affirm by Allah that they cannot   afford it because they're poor I'll give them 
one free session without a problem a full half   an hour so come to me and let's speak about 
it inshallah within the following two days   or three days I will uh try and seek Allah's 
guidance to solve the problem once and for All
